item.title: Dangerous snowstorm coming to NYC area; over 1,000 flights canceled
item.description: A major winter storm is bringing snow and ice from Minnesota to Massachusetts on Friday.

item.title: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt announces she's pregnant
item.description: White House press secretary Karoline Leavitt announced on Friday that she is pregnant with her second child.

item.title: WATCH: Stranded turtles rescued and flown to warmer water
item.description: Various organizations teamed up to get the "cold-stunned" sea turtles out of frigid Cape Cod waters.

item.title: WATCH: Torrential rains hit California coast during Christmas week
item.description: Torrential rains inundated the California coast through Christmas, sparking numerous flash flood warnings, turning roads into rivers and sending debri...

item.title: WATCH: Santa Claus caught speeding through streets of Ohio
